channel.title: Muskegon, Michigan We want to help!
channel.description: We have experience in adapting ride on vehicles for single switch access, recently converted a Wild Thing for joystick use. Have good experience in custom seating using Triwall cardboard as a construction medium. Have stl. files for printing inexpensive switches, using easily purchased materials. 25 plus years as an assistive technology consultant
